snippet: Chiara de Blasio is in the Office to Combat Domestic Violence this summer, and her brother, Dante, is working in the first deputy mayor’s office, their mother, Chirlane McCray, announced.
abstract: Chiara and Dante de Blasio begin monthlong unpaid internships at New York City Hall.
lead_paragraph: Chiara de Blasio is in the Office to Combat Domestic Violence this summer, and her brother, Dante, is working in the first deputy mayor’s office, their mother, Chirlane McCray, announced.

headline.main: 2 New Interns at City Hall: Teenagers Named de Blasio
headline.print_headline: 2 New Interns at City Hall: Teenagers Named de Blasio
